name: Smooth Monsters
description:
My First Game For a Game jam! Time for make it: 1 day

You Just Need to shoot the monsters and pick up the health boost if you need it

if theres any problem with the game let me know...

download the build "fixed" because the others dont work well

the health count dont work on the new maybe i will fix it later

Controls:

Move mouse to rotate player WASD to move around!

The health boost spawns in the same place so i'ts easy to win. but the last monster of the game is quite powerful dont forget
